1100101001000110 1100110110100101 0 -> sum: 1001011111101011, cout: 1

1011000001010100 0111010100000111 1 -> sum: 0010010101011100, cout: 1
0100100011111100 1111100001101111 1 -> sum: 0100000101101100, cout: 1
